fields.headline: Meet Dave
fields.bodyText: Meet Dave (90 mins, PG) Directed by Brian Robbins; starring Eddie Murphy, Gabrielle Union, Ed Helms Meet Dave, an extremely derivative sci-fi comedy, stars Eddie Murphy as the commander of an alien spacecraft that comes to New York to drain our seas and save his arid planet. On Earth, the ship is transmogrified into a robotic version of Murphy. It's marginally better than most of his pictures of the past 20 years, but it's crude fare.
